title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1 - Class Dj And Mj Drivers' Licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1 - Class Dj And Mj Drivers' Licenses

State Regulations
§ 1.1 - Definitions
§ 1.2 - Restrictions on operation
§ 1.3 - Operation to and from school
§ 1.4 - Operation to and from a place of business
§ 1.5 - Conversion of a class DJ or class MJ driver's license to a class D or class M driver's license
§ 1.6 - Restrictions on class DJ and class MJ driver's licenses issued prior to january 1, 1990

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 1

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 501, 508[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
